text: 1.15 Mat 15.11, Luk 11.39-41, Lom 14.14, 14.20, 14.23, 1 Ko 6.12 Binɨb kɨli God wɨdɨn adek sɨŋak gach sek ma yenɨgel okok, tap okok mɨdupsek dɨnɨgel ak tap gach sek ma dɨnɨgel. Pen binɨb God wɨdɨn adek sɨŋak gach sek mɨdɨl, Klays nop gos ma nɨgɨnɨgel okok, tap okok mɨdupsek dɨnɨgel ak tap asɨŋ. Takaw kɨli nepal ayɨp, gos kɨli ayɨp gach sek mɨdeb. Binɨb anɨb okok tek, gos tɨmud kɨli pɨsnep tɨmel gek, nɨgtep ma gɨpal.
